casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Michael Eugene BOWDEN 221P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 20, 2018 Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, Garry W. Frank, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Michael Eugene Bowden, for Bowden, Michael Eugene.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 11th of July 2018 by Defendant for Notice of Appeal:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of September 2018."

Hudson, J. and Jackson, J. recused
